title: Ayurvedic Products Natural Organic
description: We were asked to develop Abhyanga massage oils for the three Ayurvedic doshas for a local yoga studio. The response has been amazing, so we are now offering these oils on the website. That was followed by a request for foot baths, which involved more study and a foot bath event at the studio. That evening confirmed that we love these foot baths whether you know about Ayurveda or not. The studio also recommends the Fabulous Foot Cream for all who practice yoga. (We recommend it for everyone!)
